reviewText: I like to watch the WSB videos while riding stationary bike - makes the time go quickly and also get to see some good racing.  Commentary can be fun as well!  These older reviews are not as good as the current but still interesting.

I had a problem with the MotoGP 2007 DVD, the race sounds were so low, and the commentators so loud, it took the fun out of it.

Not here!

Great action.  Really inspiring.
